data.title: Titles
data.meta_description: Titles (also called badges) are configurable labels with associated icons, usually displayed next to a player's avatar and name. They appear on Spectrum, on the...
data.text:
Titles (also called badges) are configurable labels with associated icons, usually displayed next to a player's avatar and name. They appear on Spectrum, on the RSI Forums, and players' citizen dossiers.

Players can obtain titles by backing Star Citizen, purchasing packages during limited sales, or participating to various events and mini-games, either in-game or on the Roberts Space Industries website.

Backer titles

The number listed beside each title corresponds to the pledge total as displayed on the billing page required to earn that title. Original packages included titles that did not directly relate to pledge total. All backer titles can still be earned.

Recruitment titles

Titles earned via the recruitment of new backers (gained by use of referral codes). More information about the referral program can be found on the Referral Program page. All recruitment titles except for "bonus" titles can still be earned. "Bonus" recruitment titles were earned by recruiting at least one person during a certain time frame.

Title

Icon

Recruits

Additional reward Recruiter

1

Badger and Badges

A series of UEE Squadron Badges for you and a K&W CF-117 Badger Repeater for your ship.

Private

3

Gimbals and Guns

Add fire power to your ship with two gimbal mounts and two K&W CF-007 Bulldog Repeaters.

Corporal

5

Surf and Turf

Upgrade your hangar with a Greycat buggy and a stylish tank filled with exotic fish.

Sergeant

10

Gladius and Gold

Land your new Aegis Gladius next to this set of gold ship models celebrating some of the 'verse's best: the Aurora, Constellation, Hornet, Avenger, & Freelancer.

Lieutenant

25

Arena Commander Racing Package

Feed your need for speed by permanently unlocking the 350R, M50, and Mustang Gamma in Crusader & Arena Commander. Also includes 15,000 UEC.

Captain

42

Arena Commander Combat Package

Find your favorite fighter with permanent access to the Cutlass Black, Hornet, Avenger, & Aurora LN in Crusader & Arena Commander. Also includes 30,000 UEC.

Major

75

Speed Racer

Get your heart—and your ship—racing with the cutting edge power of the MISC Razor.

Lt. Colonel

100

Dog Fighter

Maneuver in and out of combat with the Vanduul armada's lightest fighter: the Blade.

Colonel

200

Ready For Battle

Soar into battle with the ship reserved for the Vanduul elite: the Glaive. Warning: This ship is for experienced combat pilots.

Brigadier General

500

Anvil Ship Package

Pair the defensive strength of the Anvil Terrapin with the aggressive punch of the Hurricane in this two-ship reward.

Major General

1042

Million Mile High Club Access

Party at the trendiest club in the 'verse. The Million Mile High Club is an exclusive, in-game facility for the most dedicated Star Citizen fans.

Lt. General

2017

Star Crossing

Voyage across the 'verse in commanding fashion with the Aegis Javelin, one of the UEE Navy's premier warships.

Icon

Recruitment Period

Additional reward 3.9 Bonus April 29, 2020 – May 11, 2020[1] PTV Bonus Septemper 9, 2020 – September 24, 2020[2] P-52 Merlin Holiday Bonus December 17, 2020 – January 11, 2021[3] Dragonfly 3.13 Bonus April 22, 2021 – May 17, 2021[4] Aurora ES 3.14 Bonus August 6, 2021 – August 31, 2021 Dragonfly with Coalfire paint 3.18 Bonus April 2023 – May 2, 2023[5] P-52 Merlin Referral Bonus November 1, 2021 – December 1, 2021[6] MPUV-1C Showdown 2952 September 8, 2022 – September 19, 2022[7] HoverQuad

Guide titles

Titles earned via acting as a guide in the Guide System. Only "successful" sessions count. To be successful, a session must be in-game, last over 30 minutes, and receive positive feedback from the guidee on the post-guiding survey. All guide titles except for the flames can still be earned.

Sessions

5

Escort

10

Instructor

25

Counselor

50

Mentor

100

Guru

150

Master

Basics Vehicle Combat FPS Combat Mining Missions Trading Touring

Special titles

Icon

Earned by

2950 - Yellow Flame Completing 1 session during the 2020 Foundation Festival. 2950 - Orange Flame Completing 3 sessions during the 2020 Foundation Festival. 2950 - Red Flame Completing 6 sessions during the 2020 Foundation Festival.

Minigame titles

Titles earned by playing minigames. Some of the minigames no longer work, so their titles can no longer be earned.

Title

Icon

Earnable?

Earned by Cartographer

✔️

Completing the Exploration Adventure minigame included in the Carrack concept sale. Predator

✔️

Completing the Normal difficulty of the Hyper Vanguard Force minigame. Apex Predator

✔️

Completing the HyperPink difficulty of the Hyper Vanguard Force minigame. Prospector

✔️

Reaching 0 UEC debt in the A Loan in the 'Verse minigame released with the Orion concept sale. Class G License

❌

Passing the DTN Class-G small land vehicle Commercial Operator's License test released with the Cyclone concept sale. Guardian Angel

✔️

Scoring at least 100,000 points in the Astromedics Back From the Brink minigame included in the Apollo concept sale. Bronze Observer

❌

Scoring 5-7 out of 10 on the Observer Test. Mutually exclusive with other Observer titles. Silver Observer

❌

Scoring 8-9 out of 10 on the Observer Test. Mutually exclusive with other Observer titles. Gold Observer

❌

Scoring 10 out of 10 on the Observer Test. Mutually exclusive with other Observer titles. Bug Skipper

❌

Warning the crew of the Belligerent Duck during the manhunt. High Jacket

❌

Alerting the Advocacy to the position of the Belligerent Duck during the manhunt. Maximum Throttle Ship Master

❌

Scoring 70% or higher on the 2018 Anniversary Sale Ship Masters test. Answer key. Sapper Badge

✔️

Winning three times in the Mission to Hadrian minigame included with the Nautilus concept sale. Spoils of War Badge

❌

Allying with the Wild Sevens, the winning faction of the Mission to Hadrian minigame included with the Nautilus concept sale.

Arena Commander titles

Titles earned by playing Arena Commander in online (multiplayer) mode. Offline mode does not grant any titles. Experimental mode title conditions and schedule is updated at https://robertsspaceindustries.com/comm-link/Comm-links/19735-Arena-Commander-Modes-Schedule.

Title

Icon

Earnable?

Earned by Aggressor

❌

Completing Vanduul Swarm in online play after GamesCom 2015. 2946 Aggressor

❌

Completing Vanduul Swarm in online play after GamesCom 2016. 2946 Pirate Aggressor

❌

Completing Pirate Swarm in online play after GamesCom 2016. 2949 Pirate Aggressor

❌

Completing Pirate Swarm in online play after Alpha 3.7. 2953 Pirate Aggressor

✔️

Completing Pirate Swarm in online play after Alpha 3.20.[8] Unlocks the Pirate Gladius and Pirate Caterpillar Pledges. 2953 Vanduul Aggressor

✔️

Reach Wave 25 of Endless Vanduul Swarm in online play. Unlocks the Esperia Glaive pledge. 2953 Master-At-Arms

✔️

Win a match of Gun Rush in online play. 2953 Tonk Commander

✔️

Finish 1st place in either Tank Royale or Team Tank Battle in online play. 999th Test Squadron

✔️

Participate until the match ends in every experimental mode in the patch cycle in online play.

Other titles

Unique titles

Titles unique to certain individuals.

Title Icon Title held by Holder of the Golden Shirt Held by the purchaser of the golden shirt which Mark Skelton wore during The Next Great Starship. 1st Place - 2020 Cosplay Contest Diabolus, the 1st place winner of the 2020 cosplay contest. 2nd Place - 2020 Cosplay Contest Kinshadow, the 2nd place winner of the 2020 cosplay contest. 3rd Place - 2020 Cosplay Contest DirectorGunner and A3ATOT, the two 3rd place winners of the 2020 cosplay contest. 1st Place - 2021 Cosplay Contest Kinshadow, the 1st place winner of the 2021 cosplay contest. 2nd Place - 2021 Cosplay Contest Diabolus, the 2nd place winner of the 2021 cosplay contest. 3rd Place - 2021 Cosplay Contest Kalamyti, the 3rd place winner of the 2021 cosplay contest.
